description:
Turning Point is collaborating with our client to recruit a Vice President of Business Development. Our client, a rapidly growing technology-driven transportation company, provides important services to children across communities on a nationwide scale. If you excel in a mission-driven, fast-paced, and technology-centric environment, this opportunity could be an ideal fit for you!

This executive will be responsible for identifying and capitalizing on strategic business opportunities, forging partnerships, and expanding our client's market presence. In addition, the role includes leading and mentoring a high-performing business development team, emphasizing training and coaching to ensure the team's continued success. We are looking for a builder with a proven track record of scaling a high-performance business development department.

Key Responsibilities:

Strategic Planning:
• Develop and implement a comprehensive business development strategy aligned with overall goals and objectives.
• Identify new market opportunities and potential areas for business expansion.
• Attend industry trade shows.

Partnership Building:
• Cultivate and manage strategic partnerships with key industry players, technology partners, and other stakeholders.
• Negotiate and structure partnerships that drive new users, enhance platform capabilities, and contribute to revenue growth.

Market Analysis:
• Conduct thorough market research to identify emerging trends, competitor strategies, and areas for disruption.
• Utilize market insights to inform strategic decision-making and stay ahead of industry developments.

Revenue Generation:
• Drive revenue growth through innovative business models that scale.
• Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to optimize customer acquisition, service provider expansion, and retention strategies.

Team Leadership, Training, and Coaching:
• Build, lead, and mentor a high-performing business development team, fostering a collaborative and results-driven culture.
• Provide ongoing training and coaching to enhance skills and capabilities.
• Conduct performance reviews and set clear development goals for team members.

Reporting and Analysis:
• Develop and maintain key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success of business development initiatives.
• Provide regular reports and updates to the executive leadership team on the progress of key initiatives and partnerships.

Qualifications:
• Experience providing executive leadership and aligning business objectives with scalable strategies and tactical plans.
• Strong analytical, negotiation, and communication skills.
• Demonstrated success in building and maintaining strategic partnerships.
• Experience leading and motivating cross-functional teams.
• Experience evolving a Start-Up company to new levels of maturity is preferred. SaaS and Ed Tech experience are highly desired.
• Proven track record meeting/exceeding revenue goals and strategic business objectives.
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA preferred.

Travel: Up to 80%

200-250 OTE
